curam.util.jmx
Class CuramMBeanUtil

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.jmx.CuramMBeanUtil

public final class CuramMBeanUtil
extends java.lang.Object

MBean utility class which provides common statistic calculations. It should be used in the MBean implementations.

Method Detail

increment

public static void increment(java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong counter,
                             long count)
Increments a long counter. If the value of the counter reaches Long.MAX_VALUE - 1, the value will be reset to 1.

Parameters:
counter - the counter to increment.
count - the value to increment with.

increment

public static boolean increment(java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong counter,
                                long count,
                                java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong[] related,
                                long[] relatedValues)
Increments a long counter. If the value of the counter reaches Long.MAX_VALUE - 1, the value will be reset to 1 and the values of the parameter 'related' will be set to the values in the parameter 'relatedValues' array.

Parameters:
counter - the counter to increment
count - the value to increment counter with
related - the related counters which will be reset to the values in 'relatedValues' if the value of the counter to be incremented is reset
relatedValues - the values used to reset the counters in 'related'
Returns:
true if the counter was reset because it reached maximum allowed value

calculateAvg

public static float calculateAvg(java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong sum,
                                 java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong count)
Calculates the average.

Parameters:
sum - the sum of the values to calculate the average for
count - the number of samples
Returns:
the average
